issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I have run the application I am currently developing on the iOS environment and observe the textfield have a larger size. 

the code has not undergone any modification and it is observed correctly in iOS 7 and using SDK 3.2.3 and 3.3.0
fields.environment:
Mavericks 10.9.4
iOS SDK 8.0
XCode 6.0.1
SDK 3.4.0 RC
Studio 3.4.0 RC

comments.body:
Hello Albert, 
please follow the guidelines to report a bug: 

https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides2/How+to+Submit+a+Bug+Report#HowtoSubmitaBugReport-SubmittingTickets

In your report you need to add: 

- Description of the issue - In short what is happening.
- Steps to reproduce the issue - Instructions and code how to reproduce this, like: create a new mobile project, paste this code into app.js and run it in a device. Please keep your testcase minimal, this is, only add code in order to show the issue, and keep out things like style, color, etc. 

Best Regards,
Mauro
Will reopen if the reporter provides a working testcase.
